title: WTB: A few SGC graded T206s
author: AndyG09

posts.post_title: WTB: A few SGC graded T206s
posts.post_content:
Hello friends.  I was hoping to add some T206s to my collection.  I would like SGC graded (no thanks on PSA) 40-50, with nice eye appeal preferred.  If you can help me out, please send scans and asking prices to: [url]andygarden09@yahoo.com[/url]

Wantlist:

Bay
Cobb (Bat On)
Coles
Dahlen (Both)   
Davis, Harry (H. Davis)
Dunn, Jack
Elberfeld (Both Port.)
Evers (Cubs on Shirt)
Flanagan
Gandil
Greminger
Hickman
Keeler (Batting)
Kling
Lafitte
Lajoie (Batting, Throwing)
Lobert
Manion
Mathewson (Port., White Cap)
McCormick
McGann
McGraw (Port. W/Cap)
Moran
Mullaney
Needham
Oakes
Overall (Hand Face)
Purtell
Rucker (Port.)
Shaughnessy
Smith (Carlos and Sid)
Tinker (Any)
Violat
Young, Cy (Any)

If you have other SGC 40-50s not on the list that you might want to part with, please let me know.  I need about 50 or so cards to get to 518.
I know what is on Ebay, thanks.


Best,
Andy
e-mail sent
Bump......

Hi Andy,

I don't have any that meet your list, but e-mail sent re available cards:
  * Chappelle, Piedmont back, in SGC 50 
  * Chase, blue portrait, with polar bear back, in SGC 50 
  * Davidson, piedmont back, in SGC 50 
  * Joss, pitching, sweet caporal back, in SGC 40 
  * Schaefer, washington, piedmont back, in SGC 40 
  * Willets, detroit, sweet caporal back, in SGC 50

Best of luck,
--S
Friendly Bump. Thanks.

Have Jake Stahl (No Glove Shows) SGC 50 SOVEREIGN for sale on the T206 page of my website.   If interested, just click the BUY IT NOW option and you'll be taken right to a check out page.   Have several other SGC 50 graded T206s on the page that are not included on you list.   Good luck hitting all of the cards on your list!

Pre-National Bump.  Thanks Chris for info on your Stahl and the kind words.  The Sovereign back makes it a bit too rich for me.

Hoping to knock a couple of the list.  Thanks!

Andy

Andy

No problem.   Another member of the Net54 board actually purchased the Stahl and a couple of my other T206s last month.

Have a great time at the National.   Wish I could get out there, but can't make it this year.

Chris

[quote name="shaunsteig" post=885792]Hi Andy,

I don't have any that meet your list, but e-mail sent re available cards:
  * Chappelle, Piedmont back, in SGC 50 
  * Chase, blue portrait, with polar bear back, in SGC 50 
  * Davidson, piedmont back, in SGC 50 
  * Joss, pitching, sweet caporal back, in SGC 40 
  * Schaefer, washington, piedmont back, in SGC 40 

Best of luck,
--S[/QUOTE]

Actually I do have one for your list: Wiltse, portrait no cap, SGC 60, for $110. Includes shipping and paypal fees. Dunno if you've updated your list or I just missed it the first time around.  (also have updated my list above to reflect recent sale of the Willetts).
Anyway, hope that helps,
--S

Sent Email

2012 Bump. At 80% and hoping to get closer to 518!

Best, 

Andy

[quote name="AndyG09" post=952413]2012 Bump. At 80% and hoping to get closer to 518!

Andy[/QUOTE]

Congrats Andy.  I've been stalled at 10 'keeper' cards for some time now :)

I have a handful of 40's and 50's - Conroy/bat, Johnson/hands at side, Joss/pitching, Pelty/vertical, Rucker/throwing.  (50's except Johnson and Joss-40's).

Thanks for the compliment Scott, and thanks again for the Brown Chi. and Marquard Throwing.  Pretty sure I have everything you have left, and so far this bump has unfortunately netted me nothing. Hope all is well!

Best,

Andy

Super Bowl weekend bump.  Hey, friends, any more help out there?  Trying to get a bit closer to 85%.  Please feel free to send prices and scans (email address at top post). Thanks for looking and have a great weekend! 

Best,

Andy

I am in a Mendoza like slump!  If you have any SGC 40s or 50s (and decently priced 60s) I would appreciate a shot at them.

Best,

Andy
Sent PM

Bump.  Got to 85%.  Can anybody help me on my way to 90%?  Have a great weekend!

Best,

Ag

Few month bump.  Big thanks to Erick for hooking me up on the last big group.  Would love to land a few more!

Best,

Andy

[quote name="AndyG09" post=996246]Few month bump.  Big thanks to Erick for hooking me up on the last big group.  Would love to land a few more!

hey andy,
help is on the way:D
